decoration.tagHintWeightZero: This tag has zero weight and will delete previous tags
decoration.keywordHintChantMarkerNotAllowed: Chant markers are not allowed in the prompt editor
decoration.keywordHintChantNotAllowed: Chants are not allowed in the chants editor

panels.promptListNeedsSave: Before opening a file, save your prompt or clear its contents.

help.quickStartDescription: Start typing in the prompt editor - changes apply automatically to your text area. Use these features:
help.normalTagsDescription: Basic tags separated by commas or line breaks:
help.chantsDefinitionDescription: Define reusable tag groups in the Chants Editor:
help.chantsNote: Use "///" for chant descriptions and "//" for regular comments
help.weightSyntaxDescription: Control tag emphasis with parentheses and brackets:
help.compilationDescription: Prompts are compiled in real-time and reflected in the target text area:

compilationSteps.embedOriginal: Original code is compressed and embedded

help.compilationNote: The original uncompiled prompt is preserved in a comment for future editing
help.tagDeletionDescription: Regardless of the settings for duplicate tag handling, tags such as "-1girl" or "-<lora:example>" can be used to delete previous tags. This notation is interpreted as having a weight of zero, and tags with a weight of zero have the special effect of deleting previous tags.
help.tagDeletionNote: Adding a regular tag afterward will restore the tags
help.dictionarySourcesDescription: Configuration of dictionary sources allows you to specify multiple data sources for auto-completion and tag suggestions.
help.dictionarySourcesDetails: Dictionary sources must be headerless CSV files encoded in UTF-8. You can specify URLs for remote sources or file paths for local sources. When multiple sources exist, all sources are loaded and merged together.
help.dictionarySourcesExample:
# CSV Format (headerless, UTF-8 encoded)
# Columns: Tag, Category, Usage count, Comma-separated aliases
1girl,1,50000,"girl,female,woman"
looking_at_viewer,2,25000,eye_contact
masterpiece,5,40000,"best_quality,high_quality"

settings.dictionarySourcesPlaceholder:
https://example.com/tags.csv  # Remote dataset
./local/tags.csv  # Local file
# Lines starting with # are comments
settings.dictionarySourcesHelp: Enter URLs or file paths, one per line. Use # for comments. Press the button in the top right to re-fetch dictionary data from the specified sources.
settings.loadDictionaryTooltip: Load dictionary data from configured sources

toast.failedToLoadAnyDictionaryData: Failed to load any dictionary data
toast.storageSaveFailed: Failed to save storage for key "{key}" at level "{level}": {error}
toast.storageParsingFailed: Failed to parse storage value for key "{key}" at level "{level}": {error}

prompts.invalidFilename: Invalid filename. Use up to 64 characters: alphanumeric + _ - . and non-ASCII only
prompts.noPromptsFound: No prompts found matching your search
